alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 3:21AM MST until December 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Fredonia and Jacob Lake including portions of Highway 89A. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult, impacting the morning and evening commutes. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 5 PM Friday: Fredonia 0 to 1 inch Jacob Lake 1 to 2 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
